column4: i have a 8 Gig IPod for when I work out and go on mission and a 120 gig zune for when I travel. I have yet to find software the will work with both at the same time
I wasnt aware of any others the work with both
also : (the underlying problem with those two players (ipod without rockbox) is that they do not expose their music files like a normal external hard drive would.
has your ipod touchjed itunes 9 yet ?
(make sure it doesn't) with that out the way : try out floola
thats one suggestion (im not sure if it works with the zune), there are others that might do both
I know that songbird has ipod management plugin, and it seems that : http://getsatisfaction.com/songbird/topics/zune_support_with_songbird
out of interest, which medai software on linux do you use that works with the zune  ?
from memory i recall that banshee worked with my ipod (while it was still alive )
just fond out im in luck songbird can handle both, but it only works with older zunes that use MTP and not the new MTPZ (mine is old :D)
I take them when I can get them
